xxl.core.indexStructures
Class RevisedRTree.NodeConverter

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.converters.Converter
      xxl.core.indexStructures.RevisedRTree.NodeConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
RevisedRTree
public class RevisedRTree.NodeConverter
extends Converter

The instances of this class are converters to write nodes to the external storage (or any other DataOutput) or read them from it (or any other DataInput).

See Also:
Converter, Serialized Form
